languages.text: Has only {g|f:a39a31f8f11445cba7e420dce565babc}Strike{/g} ability. When an enemy is hit with this weapon, all other enemies in 2 cell radius from it are attacked as well. These additional attacks can't be parried

traits.locale_text: This weapon only has the {g|f:a39a31f8f11445cba7e420dce565babc}Strike{/g} ability. On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, each enemy in a 2-cell radius around the target is also attacked and cannot {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} that attack.

This weapon only has the {g|f:a39a31f8f11445cba7e420dce565babc}Strike{/g} ability. On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, each enemy in a 2-cell radius around the target is also attacked and cannot {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} that attack.

This weapon only has the {g|f:a39a31f8f11445cba7e420dce565babc}Strike{/g} ability. On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, each enemy in a 2-cell radius around the target is also attacked and cannot {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} that attack.

languages.text: この武器は{g|f:a39a31f8f11445cba7e420dce565babc}ストライク{/g}能力のみを持つ。{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}時、対象の周囲2セル以内のすべての敵も攻撃され、その攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}することはできない。
languages.original_text: This weapon only has the {g|f:a39a31f8f11445cba7e420dce565babc}Strike{/g} ability. On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, each enemy in a 2-cell radius around the target is also attacked and cannot {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} that attack.

traits.locale_text: この武器は{g|f:a39a31f8f11445cba7e420dce565babc}ストライク{/g}能力のみを持つ。{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}時、対象の周囲2セル以内のすべての敵も攻撃され、その攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}することはできない。

languages.text: Этим оружием можно атаковать только при помощи способности {g|f:a39a31f8f11445cba7e420dce565babc}Удар{/g}. При {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадании{/g} персонаж также проводит атаку, которую нельзя {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировать{/g}, по каждому противнику в радиусе 2 клеток от первоначальной цели.
languages.original_text: This weapon only has the {g|f:a39a31f8f11445cba7e420dce565babc}Strike{/g} ability. On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, each enemy in a 2-cell radius around the target is also attacked and cannot {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} that attack.

traits.locale_text: Это оружие позволяет совершать атаки только при помощи способности {g|f:a39a31f8f11445cba7e420dce565babc}Удар{/g}. При {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадании{/g} персонаж также проводит атаку, которую нельзя {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировать{/g}, по каждому противнику в радиусе 2 клеток от первоначальной цели

Это оружие позволяет совершать атаки только при помощи способности {g|f:a39a31f8f11445cba7e420dce565babc}Удар{/g}. При {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадании{/g} персонаж также проводит атаку, которую нельзя {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировать{/g}, по каждому противнику в радиусе 2 клеток от первоначальной цели

Этим оружием можно атаковать только при помощи способности {g|f:a39a31f8f11445cba7e420dce565babc}Удар{/g}. При {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадании{/g} персонаж также проводит атаку, которую нельзя {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировать{/g}, по каждому противнику в радиусе 2 клеток от первоначальной цели.

languages.text: Diese Waffe hat nur die {g|f:a39a31f8f11445cba7e420dce565babc}Hieb{/g}-Fähigkeit. Im Falle eines {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffers{/g} werden alle Gegner in einem Radius von 2 Feldern um das Ziel ebenfalls attackiert und können diesen Angriff nicht {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parieren{/g}.
languages.original_text: This weapon only has the {g|f:a39a31f8f11445cba7e420dce565babc}Strike{/g} ability. On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, each enemy in a 2-cell radius around the target is also attacked and cannot {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} that attack.

traits.locale_text: Diese Waffe hat nur die {g|f:a39a31f8f11445cba7e420dce565babc}Hieb{/g}-Fähigkeit. Im Falle eines {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffers{/g} werden alle Gegner in einem Radius von 2 Feldern um das Ziel ebenfalls attackiert und können diesen Angriff nicht {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parieren{/g}.

languages.text: Bu silah, yalnızca {g|f:a39a31f8f11445cba7e420dce565babc}Atak{/g} kabiliyetine sahiptir. {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Vuruş{/g} hâlinde hedefin etrafındaki 2 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan tüm düşmanlar da saldırıya uğrar ve bu saldırıyı {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturamazlar{/g}.
languages.original_text: This weapon only has the {g|f:a39a31f8f11445cba7e420dce565babc}Strike{/g} ability. On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, each enemy in a 2-cell radius around the target is also attacked and cannot {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} that attack.

traits.locale_text: Bu silah, yalnızca {g|f:a39a31f8f11445cba7e420dce565babc}Atak{/g} kabiliyetine sahiptir. {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Vuruş{/g} hâlinde hedefin etrafındaki 2 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan tüm düşmanlar da saldırıya uğrar ve bu saldırıyı {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturamazlar{/g}.

languages.text: Cette arme ne dispose que de la capacité {g|f:a39a31f8f11445cba7e420dce565babc}Frappe{/g}. Lorsque cette arme {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} sa cible, chaque ennemi se trouvant dans un rayon de 2 cases subit également une attaque qui ne peut pas être {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parée{/g}.
languages.original_text: This weapon only has the {g|f:a39a31f8f11445cba7e420dce565babc}Strike{/g} ability. On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, each enemy in a 2-cell radius around the target is also attacked and cannot {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} that attack.

traits.locale_text: Cette arme ne dispose que de la capacité {g|f:a39a31f8f11445cba7e420dce565babc}Frappe{/g}. Lorsque cette arme {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} sa cible, chaque ennemi se trouvant dans un rayon de 2 cases subit également une attaque qui ne peut pas être {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parée{/g}.

languages.text: Esta arma solo tiene la capacidad {g|f:a39a31f8f11445cba7e420dce565babc}Mazazo{/g}. Al {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactar{/g}, todo enemigo situado en un radio de 2 casillas alrededor del objetivo recibe también el ataque sin opción a {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pararlo{/g}.
languages.original_text: This weapon only has the {g|f:a39a31f8f11445cba7e420dce565babc}Strike{/g} ability. On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, each enemy in a 2-cell radius around the target is also attacked and cannot {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} that attack.

traits.locale_text: Esta arma solo tiene la capacidad {g|f:a39a31f8f11445cba7e420dce565babc}Mazazo{/g}. Al {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactar{/g}, todo enemigo situado en un radio de 2 casillas alrededor del objetivo recibe también el ataque sin opción a {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pararlo{/g}.

languages.text: 这把武器只有{g|f:a39a31f8f11445cba7e420dce565babc}打击{/g}这一个能力。{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，距离目标2格内的所有敌人都会受到攻击，且无法{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}此次攻击。
languages.original_text: This weapon only has the {g|f:a39a31f8f11445cba7e420dce565babc}Strike{/g} ability. On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, each enemy in a 2-cell radius around the target is also attacked and cannot {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} that attack.

traits.locale_text: 这把武器只有{g|f:a39a31f8f11445cba7e420dce565babc}打击{/g}这一个能力。{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，距离目标2格内的所有敌人都会受到攻击，且无法{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}此次攻击。
